organizations: Network Writers News Corp Australia Justin Bieber
title: Nude pics showed ‘shrinkage’
text:
Justin Bieber says nude photos showed ‘shrinkage’ Network Writers News Corp Australia Justin Bieber says nude photos showed ‘shrinkage’ Network Writers News Corp Australia ‘Shrinkage’ ... Justin Bieber has had a sense of humour about those infamous nude photos. Picture: AP 
JUSTIN Bieber has made light of those nude photos, joking that the infamous full frontal shot “was shrinkage for me”. 
Speaking to Access Hollywood ’s Bully Bush, Bieber also got serious for a second, describing how he felt violated by the paparazzi shots, which captured him swimming naked while on holiday in Bora Bora. ‘You should feel comfortable in your own space’ ... Speaking to Billy Bush on Access Hollywood, Bieber said he felt violated by paparazzi shots showing him naked. Picture: NBC 
“My first thing was like, how can they do this? Like, I feel super violated. Like, I feel like I can’t step outside and feel like I can go outside naked. 
“You should feel comfortable in your own space — especially that far away.” 
Bieber was on holiday with model Jayde Pierce when he stepped out of their villa, for a dip in their private pool. Bieber in Bora Bora 
And if that wasn’t bad enough, the superstar’s father, Jeremy Bieber, made the global population cringe after he tweeted his approval at his son’s er, appendage, calling himself a “proud daddy”. Other Stories
